title: AEX2013
author: AEX2013
content: In order to celebrate the 3rd anniversary of AEX’s financial business and appreciate our users, AEX Global launches a series of liquidity mining activities offering higher-than-average profits. Click AEX Global - ASwap to join the liquidity mining, and win mysterious bonuses.   ASwap is a liquidity mining product based on AMM launched in 2020 by AEX. It consists of 6 liquidity pools, namely GAT Pool, Stable Pool, Hot Pool, Activity Pool, Interest Raise Pool and Moon Pool. Every liquidity pool includes two different coins even ETH, Solana, BSC, HECO, and Polkadot. By now, the TVL of ASwap has exceeded 200 million dollars, accumulatively generating more than $41216728 of profits for users. Detailed information: https://www.aex.com/page/amm_swap.html#/poolList?type=2Novice-friendly Liquidity Mining ProductIf you have no idea about liquidity mining, nothing is better than a secure, stable and profitable product allowing you to invest or withdraw your digital assets at any time. The novice-friendly ASwap will provide you with many liquidity pools involving over 100 types of coins. No lock-up, assets security, high APR and quick swap.200+ Liquidity Pools, Come and Find more GAT Surprises  Digital assets on different chains can swap through Aswap. 100+ types of coins can develop 200+ liquidity pools for users to swap on ASwap. Generally, users will get incomes in GAT(AEX’s platform coin) or stablecoins, but sometimes users will receive hot coins such as GMT and DOGE as a reward for genesis mining. When genesis mining ends, what you get will be converted to equivalent stablecoins or GAT. It is worth saying that if users are unsatisfied with  current liquidity pools, they can build their liquidity pool to gain trading fees (in GAT) and mining yields. Below is detailed guidance.Flexible Access, No Lock-upThe greatest risks of liquidity mining include liquidation and impermanent loss. Different protocols have different possibilities of liquidation, while AEX does not lock up positions, so users can avoid this risk. At the same time, AEX’s professional quantitative organizations will help users hedge the risk, so as to minimise the impermanent loss. Users can invest or withdraw their digital assets at any time and need not worry about missing the chance.High Assets Security with 0 incidents happening AEX has been running safely for 9 years since it was established in 2013. No stealing nor security incident happened until now, which proves that AEX deserves your trust. Higher-than-average APRASwap provides various liquidity pools with an APR higher than the industry average, in which users can enjoy 0 gas fees and quick receive of interest. The Stable Pool, as the most popular mining pool, involves two stablecoins, in which users can grab incomes under low risks and enjoy the APR up to 16.9%, averagely 10%-15%. Parts of the Stable Pool can even enjoy interest raise.Super Quick SwapAEX, with 22 fiat-cryptocurrency channels, supports quick arrival. When you want to participate in ASwap, you can get the mining token in the way of spot swap or direct fiat conversion quickly. No miss the earning chance.How to start ASwap Liquidity Mining?There are 6 liquidity mining pools with corresponding ways to join.1. GAT PoolIt contains GAT-Token liquidity pools. Users can join it by adding GAT and other tokens in a certain proportion into the GAT Pool. Click ASwap >> List of liquidity Pools >> GAT Pool to join. Users will get GAT as rewards.https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5612AQFVWdts-pBq1Q/article-inline_image-shrink_1500_2232/0/1652429003021?e=1657756800&v=beta&t=NKcg1npvT0wNJdC9dRaDJIlr-RG0wi6LTW7wfdZtsCUhttps://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5612AQGefOfbC727aA/article-inline_image-shrink_1500_2232/0/1652429026094?e=1657756800&v=beta&t=Nereg8hDtVbQbbUCkgqBjSg9i_On7UN-HqccZY6NEhghttps://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5612AQGI-moQxhhu-w/article-inline_image-shrink_1500_2232/0/1652429038422?e=1657756800&v=beta&t=k5vntGndwS8CAPP03EnO9nISFE7vZ1BkvXrXRm8_sGc2. Stable PoolIt contains Stablecoin-Stablecoin liquidity pools, in which users can grab incomes under low risks due to stablecoins’ low price fluctuation. Users can join it by adding two stablecoins in a certain proportion into the Stable Pool. Click ASwap >> List of liquidity Pools >> Stale Pool to join. Users will get GAT or hot coins as rewards. Please note that some stable pools can enjoy interest raise (the more you invest, the more interest raise you can enjoy). On this 3rd anniversary(May 1- May 15), the Stable Pool launched an event “Mine DOGE for free, Enjoy 600% Genesis APR”. After the genesis mining, users will gain USDT as rewards, and can continuously grab passive incomes. https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5612AQHshPzFHy1C2Q/article-inline_image-shrink_1500_2232/0/1652429096563?e=1657756800&v=beta&t=-v5ALUlyDZCJi8_3thjzPuDTxIGfOJO9qUJh4BKxMVYhttps://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5612AQFIzWIdVPjR_A/article-inline_image-shrink_1500_2232/0/1652429129724?e=1657756800&v=beta&t=wBfYQfn7VQm5uCkFz3PTll1_xkSUkZLcXZHCU3cKwoI3. Hot PoolIt involves some currently hot coins such as BTC, ETH, and DOGE. Users can join it by adding two hot coins in a certain proportion into the Hot Pool. Click ASwap >> List of liquidity Pools >> Hot Pool to join. Users will get GAT as rewards. It is obvious that no matter in which liquidity pool, the APR is always around 10%-15%, higher than the industry average.  https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5612AQHDD7Uw1s2ueQ/article-inline_image-shrink_1500_2232/0/1652429210966?e=1657756800&v=beta&t=vxXQV9K_gHx8wD16NDoYkhiRnnnLsD46kCNL0hvmDKc4. Activity PoolIt is where the latest activities on ASwap are presented, such as genesis mining, and adding new coin pairs, for users to join especially the novice. Usually, users joining these activities will obtain high APR as rewards, the earlier you join, the more you will obtain, because the APR will fluctuate with the TVL. Click ASwap >> List of liquidity Pools >> Activity Pool to join.https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5612AQFY73zWzRcrnw/article-inline_image-shrink_1500_2232/0/1652429261524?e=1657756800&v=beta&t=18pSij8Z1yQ8RxpWGK7LlzZUu-2jstV95scOF3ftC8Y5. Interest Rate Hike PoolThe more you invest, the higher interest you will get. Click ASwap >> List of liquidity Pools >> Interest Rate Hike Pool to join.https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5612AQFA6OZc-JER3w/article-inline_image-shrink_1500_2232/0/1652429308282?e=1657756800&v=beta&t=EDoi03taNjGBIUsylHFyaCJ9ync8AUmjtTPMFQPeRUchttps://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5612AQG3SOzVbwLf4w/article-inline_image-shrink_1500_2232/0/1652429325071?e=1657756800&v=beta&t=f1o06qYzQONpEIONlIWOcJUNsFNbU0z-rrhdOchPb6Q6. Moon PoolIt is a specific pool for genesis mining, usually providing genesis mining activity of some hot coins. Users can add some stablecoins in a certain proportion to join the activity and get the hot coins as returns. The earlier you join, the more you will obtain, because the genesis APR will fluctuate with the TVL. When the activity ends, all rewards you obtain will be converted to equivalent USDT. Click ASwap >> List of liquidity Pools >> Moon Pool to join.https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5612AQEaFvVEs2NLJA/article-inline_image-shrink_1500_2232/0/1652429362933?e=1657756800&v=beta&t=zeFrIV8hxMxKclIQPx2YH9glEXKFboc3lmkjQw6WB1whttps://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5612AQGhitGPhqAaLQ/article-inline_image-shrink_1500_2232/0/1652429382679?e=1657756800&v=beta&t=DrGtyGXbJMLCl_WTOIYQWzxjlX-7cl3hLoGaHMDbWp8Advanced Play-- Self-built Mining Pool If the current pools cannot meet your requirements, building a pool on your own by clicking ASwap>>Create a Liquidity Pool is one way to go. It will help users get both profits and transaction fees. At most 8 coins can be added and the total percentage of the added coin needs to be 1. The defaulted transaction fee is 0.3%. https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5612AQGKR5LEdsEhVQ/article-inline_image-shrink_1500_2232/0/1652429443441?e=1657756800&v=beta&t=eJRI8PtgpthehvY8cjGjV0B3oN5JNdkzgROS5NaJFtEThis is for advanced users who have better knowledge of cryptocurrencies. AEX don’t suggest novices have a try.More Benefits and Rules1. Up to 1000U Prize Draw for New UsersThis is for the newly registered users only. New users need to click ASwap to join the prize draw within 15 days after successful registration, otherwise, it will be deemed as a waiver.https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5612AQFk-SBvAAFRjA/article-inline_image-shrink_1500_2232/0/1652429488287?e=1657756800&v=beta&t=0YzF_X2GEe22yLGSpTnrXlvGh1Kwn6IuZ_8cvOcz9Co2. Rules of ReferenceAnother way to join Aswap and grab more benefits is to refer your friends and families. Users can get an up to 30% rebate by referring at least one newly registered user. https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5612AQGxCtkGBXlZsQ/article-inline_image-shrink_1500_2232/0/1652429672468?e=1657756800&v=beta&t=e2ku0OKxUKgxTzxdyQjWS06mR9ucVVCLDl2FJkrNJ7MAEX Global launched its global national strategy this year, so more 0-cost and high-profit events will be held to appreciate our regular or new users.   At the time of the 3rd anniversary of AEX Global financial product, AEX launched a series of barrier-free and profitable events to appreciate our users, such as mining DOGE in ASwap; joining AEX Earn to win BTC; interest-free borrowing; and referring friends to grab up to 10,000 USDT. Mysterious bonuses are waiting for you. Come with your friends and families to aex.com for more information.About AEX GlobalAEX, a cryptocurrency financial exchange founded in 2013, is dedicated to providing secure, complete, simple, and diversified digital financial management to billions of people. The closer you look, the further you see. AEX offers a wide range of scenarios covering many areas including Fiat, Spot, Finance, Loan and Mining. In AEX Earn, there are Fixed Savings, Flexible Savings, DeFi, Staking, and Dual Investment to meet users' needs. AEX Earn is the world leader in the type of coins and APR, offering its users a variety of earning opportunities.
